metadata.title: Eid-ul-Adha Prayer at Faisal Masjid at 6:30 AM

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 06 (APP): Eid-ul-Adha prayer at Faisal Masjid will be held at 6:30 AM on Saturday(today). The prayer will be led by Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ilyas, Director General, Da'wah Academy, International Islamic University Islamabad.
